traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, one target. 22 (3d8 damage) piercing damage. Target must make a DC 19 Dexterity save, or be swallowed by the worm!
